text:
I’ve fought for consumers all my life:
—Took on big banks committing credit-debt collection abuses, resulting in $50M in restitutions
—Secured $20B for CA homeowners during the foreclosure crisis
—Won $1.1B against Corinthian Colleges

I'll continue that fight during this crisis.

#PPP NOTES 2/3:
PPP has some serious implementation issues

Yet over 3500 lenders have approved over 500000 #PPPloans at rate of over $3 billion per hour. 

True,the program isn’t ideal yet. But it also isn’t paralyzed if it committed 30% of the funds in its first four days.

I will be holding my weekly press conference call with reporters at 12:15 pm ET today.

Listen in here: https://www.c-span.org/video/?471078-1/house-speaker-weekly-briefing-conference-call

So what does trillions more in debt do to your economy, currency, inflation, growth, etc.? https://twitter.com/SteveDeaceShow/status/1248234982402920450

Nearly 40% of Americans don't have enough cash to cover a $400 unexpected expense. A one time check won't cut it.

Americans deserve reoccurring monthly payments to reduce the burden of this crisis. 
https://twitter.com/thehill/status/1248318299571699714 QT @thehill Harris, Ocasio-Cortez among Democrats calling for recurring direct payments in fourth coronavirus bill https://thehill.com/policy/finance/492034-harris-ocasio-cortez-among-democrats-calling-for-recurring-direct-payments-in http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EVLq4MhUUAEIdyN.jpg

To support the American people during this pandemic, Congress must:

💵 Guarantee 100% of all workers' paychecks
💊 Empower Medicare to pay all out-of-pocket costs
🏦 Provide $2,000 a month for all
🤒 Give paid sick leave to all workers
🏡 Suspend rent and mortgage payments

This story is absolutely heartbreaking. Heidi’s & my prayers are with the McKean family and the entire extended Kennedy family. To lose a young Mom and her 8-yr-old child like this, chasing a ball in their canoe, is just horrifying. May God’s Grace and Peace be upon you. RIP. https://twitter.com/kens5/status/1247981289736675330 QT @KENS5 Maeve Kennedy Townsend McKean's body was recovered on Sunday and the body of her 8-year-old son, Gideon McKean, was found on Wednesday around 1:30 p.m. 

McKean and her son are the granddaughter and great-grandson of Robert F. Kennedy. https://www.kens5.com/article/news/local/maryland/coast-guard-searches-for-2-missing-canoers-near-annapolis/65-0dfddd1d-9192-4d47-a178-905e349fb035

🚨 The Trump admin is ENDING FEDERAL FUNDING for coronavirus testing sites on Friday 🚨

Yes, you read that right. It’s completely irresponsible.

If anything, we should err on the side of testing “too much” - we’re *nowhere* near that.

Trump ending support now will cost lives. https://twitter.com/npratc/status/1247988083376549888 QT @npratc The federal government will end funding for coronavirus testing sites on Friday. While some sites will transition to being state-managed, others will close as a result. This as criticism continues that not enough testing is available.
https://www.npr.org/sections/coronavirus-live-updates/2020/04/08/829955099/federal-support-for-coronavirus-testing-sites-end-as-peak-nears?utm_source=twitter.com&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=atc&utm_term=nprnews&utm_content=20200408

This pandemic is exploiting long existing environmental injustices all across the country. Clean air is a human right but too many communities are suffering from toxic air pollution. We must fight for clean air for all. https://www.nytimes.com/2020/04/07/climate/air-pollution-coronavirus-covid.html

#PPP NOTES 3/3:
PPP is a massive new program,with only 6 days to implement. It was bound to have significant glitches
